meanings.sent1: The uninvoked power of the old wizard remained hidden until needed.
meanings.sent2: The spellbook contained many uninvoked enchantments waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent3: The uninvoked magic potion turned out to be a fizzy drink instead.
meanings.sent4: Her uninvoked talent for painting suddenly bloomed like a hidden flower.
meanings.sent5: The uninvoked strength within him surged forth when he faced the dragon.

meanings.sent1: The uninvoked opinions of the quiet student surprised everyone with their wisdom.
meanings.sent2: The uninvoked assistance from the stranger turned out to be a lifesaver.
meanings.sent3: His uninvoked suggestion to have a picnic in the rain made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The uninvoked gift of a handmade card brought unexpected joy to her day.
meanings.sent5: The uninvoked question about the missing cookie jar puzzled the detective.
